parameters.name: IncludeListener
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return information about the associated listeners. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false** (default): no

parameters.name: IncludeRule
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the forwarding rules associated with the vServer groups. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false** (default): no

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the CLB instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~27584~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
